title: How to Draw a Cute Mouse from Transformice

steps.headline: Make an O with a split on the top of the head.
steps.description: Form it with the head. Also, make a curved line on the body as shown.

steps.headline: Add one arm on the first curve, and another on the second.
steps.description: Put squashed o's on the bottom, and draw a "n" as a second ear.

steps.headline: Draw the eye.
steps.description: Add a circle with two tiny black dots. Make sure they are touching and take up more than 30% of the eye.

steps.headline: Draw whiskers by putting a dot and curved lines coming out of it.
Draw the tail.
steps.description: The tail is simple enough; just look at the picture.

steps.headline: Shade the body, but not in front of that curve.
steps.description: Shade the small ear more, but that curve on the ear is also shaded.

steps.headline: Add cute clothes, such as a top hat or a cane.
steps.description: You can also add items such as glasses, hairstyles, and earrings.

text: Draw an 8 without the belt.  Make an O with a split on the top of the head. Form it with the head. Also, make a curved line on the body as shown. Add one arm on the first curve, and another on the second. Put squashed o's on the bottom, and draw a "n" as a second ear. Draw the eye. Add a circle with two tiny black dots. Make sure they are touching and take up more than 30% of the eye. Draw whiskers by putting a dot and curved lines coming out of it.  Draw the tail. The tail is simple enough; just look at the picture. Shade the body, but not in front of that curve. Shade the small ear more, but that curve on the ear is also shaded. Add cute clothes, such as a top hat or a cane. You can also add items such as glasses, hairstyles, and earrings. Finished.
